LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenant.label: spite-revenant
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenant.description: From the dark and deep woods comes the spite-revenant. Merciless, fast and deadly they come to do their duty and uphold that which once was.
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenant.tools.0.label: right shifting branch
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenant.tools.1.label: left shifting branch
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenant_Corpse.label: spite-revenant corpse
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenantAnimal.label: spite-revenant
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenantAnimal.description: From the dark and deep woods comes the spite-revenant. Merciless, fast and deadly they come to do their duty and uphold that which once was.
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenantAnimal.tools.0.label: right shifting branch
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenantAnimal.tools.1.label: left shifting branch
LanguageData.DryadSpiteRevenantAnimal_Corpse.label: spite-revenant corpse
